name: VR stage dancer
description:
This is a casual entertainment game. Bring a VR helmet into the scene and enjoy the virtual idol dancing to the music. There are tons of music and dance for you to choose from, and the dancers will dance on the stage. The player can also use the handle to control the movement, shorten the distance with the dancer, and appreciate the dancer's dance at close range, so that the player can relax.

Instructions:
The arrow keys on the left handle control the player to move, and the trigger button to select songs.
